color.invalid: Color code **`[color]`** is invalid! Please use a valid color code. HEX only!

set.title: Color updated!
set.description: Color `[key]` for **`[module]`** module has been updated to **`[color]`**!

reset.title: Color reset!
reset.description: Color `[key]` for **`[module]`** module has been reset to default!
